name: HORIZONTAL
description:
Horizontal is a tiny little solo-developed horror-esque experience for the Playdate. Give it a shot, and give me a poke if you run into any spooky (unintentional ;)) bugs!

YouTube link in the sidebar for a playthrough if you don't have a Playdate.

CHANGELOG:

6/9/22: fileplayer bug (that may or may not completely crash the game sometimes) found in Playdate SDK, waiting on input from Panic. UPDATE: fix should come in 1.12.1 Playdate SDK. Will push new version when that launches.
